title: Unable to lock in champ in champ select
body:
I've noticed since 7.23 that occasionally that I cannot lock in champions when in champ select. This ONLY happens when I queue fill. If I queue for specific roles (both Draft and Ranked Solo/Duo) I don't encounter this issue. 

I am now having to deal with a 30 minute timer because the client is messing up. 

Is this an issue that other people are experiencing? I've look throughout and there has been mention of latency causing the problem however I've run tests with my latency and I'm receiving the usual 19-20MS so it's highly unlikely that it's that. 

Any fixes to this? It's quite annoying queuing for a game (as fill because I don't really mind what roles I'm playing) to not be able to lock in my champ and then have to face a queue time for an issue that apparently has been plaguing the client since the change over. 

Really poor experience if you ask me especially for players who don't dodge (I don't dodge unless the client has something like this). 

Would be nice to hear back from some one.
